definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The company boasts a lot of awards it received at international fairs.
sentences.chinese: 该公司在国际性会展上一举揽获数项大奖。

sentences.english: Ed Korczak:NWFA is an international association.
sentences.chinese: 美国木地板协会是一个国际性组织。

sentences.english: The Olympic Games are an international sports festival held every four years.
sentences.chinese: 奥运会是每四年举行1次的国际性体育节。

sentences.english: International posts should be filled according to merit.
sentences.chinese: 国际性职位应该任人唯贤。

sentences.english: This could include an international arms embargo and other targeted sanctions on Burma.
sentences.chinese: 这可包括国际性的武器禁运令和其他针对性的制裁。

sentences.english: Which international sport events have been carried out around the Qinghai tourism resources?
sentences.chinese: 围绕青海特色旅游资源开展的国际性体育赛事有哪些？

sentences.english: It is an international banking center. Population, 7,617.
sentences.chinese: 它是一个国际性的金融中心。

sentences.english: No wonder our star is fading from the international sky.
sentences.chinese: 在国际性夜空中我们的星光正变暗淡。

sentences.english: Politzer Society - international society for otological surgery.
sentences.chinese: 耳鼻喉外科方面的国际性团体。

sentences.english: CGU is a leading international institutional investor.
sentences.chinese: 商联是一家领先的国际性机构投资者。

sentences.english: Founded in 1946, Arup is an international organization.
sentences.chinese: 奥雅纳成立于1946年，是一家国际性企业。

sentences.english: I agreed to speak at an international conference in Shanghai next Monday.
sentences.chinese: 我答应下星期一在上海的一个国际性大会上讲话。

sentences.english: They all come from different parts of the globe, making this a truly international cast.
sentences.chinese: 他们来自世界各地，使之成为真正国际性的演员阵容。

sentences.english: Eltrix River is the only one river running into the Arctic Ocean in China.
sentences.chinese: 额尔齐斯河是我国流入北冰洋的唯一国际性河流。

sentences.english: Charter Link has established a strong agents net works all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 嘉林国际物流拥有强大的国际性网络。

sentences.english: Dongguan, where the export-oriented economy prospers , has become an international processing and manufacturing center.
sentences.chinese: 东莞外向型经济发达，已成为国际性加工制造业基地。

definition: domestic and international/at home and abroad
